title: Tech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 26 Viral TikTok Gifts That Are Actually Worth It (2025)
items.description: We’re testing the gadgets that keep showing up in our feeds. Here's what deserves the hype—and would make awesome presents.

items.title: The hottest AI wearables and gadgets you can buy right now
items.description: We compiled all the hottest AI wearables currently available, including Bee, Friend, Plaud, and more.

items.title: SpaceX’s upgraded Starship suffers explosion during testing
items.description: It may not have been a massive fireball, but SpaceX now has more work to do before it can kick off this next-generation version of Starship.

items.title: Google says hackers stole data from 200 companies following Gainsight breach

items.title: 11 Best Smartwatches (2025): Apple, Wear OS, Hybrid & Kids’ Watches
items.description: These WIRED-tested wearables reduce your reliance on a phone while keeping you connected.

items.title: Posha vs. Thermomix: Kitchen Robots Face Off on Thanksgiving Sides
items.description: The Posha and the Thermomix TM7 are the closest things to a home robot chef that mere mortals can afford. The catch is that you’re the prep cook.

items.title: CrowdStrike fires ‘suspicious insider’ who passed information to hackers

items.title: X begins rolling out the ‘About this account’ feature to users’ profiles
items.description: The feature will show where users are based, how they're connected to X, and how many times they've changed their username.
